name: Super Mario on Scratch Halloween Reboot - HTML Port
name_original: Super Mario on Scratch Halloween Reboot - HTML Port
description:
This is Super Mario on Scratch Halloween Reboot that is now ported to itch.io!

It may take a little while to load.

Here is the game running on Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/561119000/

Credits:

@MusicManJoe on Scratch for early playtesting

@griffpatch on Scratch for base collision code

@Brad-Games on Scratch for a bit of the tick code and feedback

@FunnyAnimatorJimTV on Scratch for helping enemy listing code

@BILLGATESFAN on Scratch for helping the clone spawning code and feedback

@MaxyBrian on Scratch for the Mobile Joystick

@Grayforz24682 on Scratch for support

Special Thanks To:

@triangle5820 on Scratch

@-NightCatStudios- on Scratch

@xXNunyaXx on Scratch

Music from Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii and DS

Nintendo for Mario and most of the other characters
